Oregon.description: A training facility with tight angles and vertical play.

strategies: Take Master Balcony control and open Attic wall.
Pinch site from Big Window and Trophy.
Establish crossfire on Kids from Trophy and Big Window.
Hold flanks from White Stairs and Main Lobby.

operators.name: Ace
operators.task: Open Attic wall from Master.

operators.name: Zofia
operators.task: Clear Trophy utility and pressure White Stairs.

operators.name: Sledge
operators.task: Disrupt roamers and support Trophy push.

operators.name: Nomad
operators.task: Place Airjabs on White and Lobby.

operators.name: Iana
operators.task: Use clone for intel and frag from Big Window.

strategies: Anchor in Attic and Trophy with shields and ADS.
Rotate between Kids and Dorms with crossfires.
Deny Big Window and Master Balcony with utility.

operators.name: Smoke
operators.task: Deny plant with smokes from Trophy.

operators.name: Jäger
operators.task: Protect shields and rotate spots.

operators.name: Aruni
operators.task: Gate Attic and Trophy doors.

operators.name: Mute
operators.task: Jam drones in key entry points.

operators.name: Wamai
operators.task: Catch nades from Big Window and Trophy.

strategies: Push from Small Tower and breach Kitchen wall.
Take Dining control with vertical play from Meeting.
Clear roamers in Security and Showers first.

operators.name: Thermite
operators.task: Breach Kitchen wall from Small Tower.

operators.name: Buck
operators.task: Use Skeleton Key from Meeting.

operators.name: Twitch
operators.task: Disable defender gadgets in Dining.

operators.name: Nomad
operators.task: Cover Security and Showers.

operators.name: Flores
operators.task: Clear deployables in Kitchen and Dining.

strategies: Hold Kitchen with shields and rotate to Dining.
Deny breach from Small Tower with impact tricking.
Play vertical denial from Dorms.

operators.name: Castle
operators.task: Block Dining and Kitchen line of sights.

operators.name: Smoke
operators.task: Hold Kitchen with gas denial.

operators.name: Pulse
operators.task: Play from below to C4 attackers.

operators.name: Mute
operators.task: Place jammers at choke points.

operators.name: Jäger
operators.task: Protect Kitchen door and site shield.

strategies: Push through Small Tower and breach Meeting wall.
Clear roamers in Kitchen and Security.
Plant behind benches in Meeting safely with smoke cover.

operators.name: Hibana
operators.task: Open Meeting wall from Small Tower.

operators.name: Sledge
operators.task: Clear Kitchen and assist with vertical.

operators.name: Capitao
operators.task: Use smoke/fire to deny rotates.

operators.name: Dokkaebi
operators.task: Force movement with Logic Bombs.

operators.name: Thatcher
operators.task: Clear wall denial for Hibana.

strategies: Anchor in Meeting and Kitchen with rotation.
Deny plant with vertical C4 from Dorms.
Contest Small Tower entry with roamers.

operators.name: Maestro
operators.task: Watch plant zones with Evil Eyes.

operators.name: Mute
operators.task: Jam Meeting walls and doors.

operators.name: Bandit
operators.task: Trick breach on Meeting wall.

operators.name: Lesion
operators.task: Slow attackers from Small Tower.

operators.name: Valkyrie
operators.task: Throw cams around site and flanks.

strategies: Clear Freezer and Laundry Stairs for execute.
Open E-Box wall and push from Blue.
Drone out and eliminate roamers above.

operators.name: Ace
operators.task: Open E-Box wall.

operators.name: Finka
operators.task: Support push with adrenal surges.

operators.name: Nokk
operators.task: Flank from Freezer or Tower.

operators.name: Iana
operators.task: Clone clear Blue and Tower Stairs.

operators.name: Lion
operators.task: Use EE-ONE-D to lock roamers in place.

strategies: Hold Freezer and Blue with ADS and rotates.
Play shield in Pillar with utility dump.
Anchor Laundry and E-Box for plant denial.

operators.name: Smoke
operators.task: Deny Laundry push with gas.

operators.name: Kaid
operators.task: Electroclaw Security and Meeting hatches.

operators.name: Wamai
operators.task: Protect Pillar with magnets.

operators.name: Aruni
operators.task: Use gates at Blue and Laundry.

operators.name: Echo
operators.task: Use drones to stop plant from behind.
